cellar:
+1 Action

Discard any number of cards, then draw that many.
chapel: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.
moat:
+2 Cards
-------------
When another player plays an Attack card, you may first reveal this from your hand, to be unaffected by it.
harbinger:
+1 Card
+1 Action

Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.
merchant:
+1 Card
+1 Action

The first time you play a silver this turn, +1<:coin:377195990010298368>
vassal:
+2<:coin:377195990010298368>

Discard the top card of your deck. If it's an Action card, play it.
workshop: Gain a card costing up to 4<:coin:377195990010298368>
bureaucrat: Gain a Silver onto your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from their hand and puts it onto their deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).
gardens: Worth 1<:VP:377195966471864320> per 10 cards you have (round down).
militia:
+2<:coin:377195990010298368>

Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
moneylender: You may trash a Copper from your hand for +3<:coin:377195990010298368>.
poacher:
+1 Card
+1Action
+1<:coin:377195990010298368>

Discard a card per empty supply pile.
remodel:
Trash a card from your hand.
Gain a card costing up to 2<:coin:377195990010298368> more than it.
throne-room: You may play an Action card from your hand twice.
bandit: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes a revealed Treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.
council-room:
+4 Cards
+1 Buy

Each other player draws a card.
library: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand, skipping any Action cards you choose to; set those aside, discarding them afterwards.
mine: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Gain a Treasure to your hand costing up to 3<:coin:377195990010298368> more than it.
sentry:
+1 Card
+1 Action

Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.
witch:
+2 Cards

Each other player gains a Curse.
artisan:
Gain a card to your hand costing up to 5<:coin:377195990010298368>.
Put a card from your hand onto your deck.
chancellor:
+2<:coin:377195990010298368>

You may immediatlt put your deck onto your discard pile.
feast:
Trash this card.
Gain a card costing up to 5<:coin:377195990010298368>.
spy:
+1 Card
+1 Action

Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.
thief: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.
adventurer: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.
embargo:
+2<:coin:377195990010298368>

Trash this. Add an Embargo token to a Supply pile. (For the rest of the game, when a player buys a card from that pile, they gain a Curse.)
haven:
+1 Card
+1 Action

Set aside a card from your hand face down (under this). At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.
lighthouse:
+1 Action

Now and at the start of your next turn: +1<:coin:377195990010298368>
---------------
 While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.
native-village:
+2 Actions

 Choose one: Put the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat (you may look at those cards at any time); or put all the cards from your mat into your hand.
pearl-diver:
+1 Card
+1 Action

Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.
ambassador: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.
fishing-village:
+2 Actions
+1<:coin:377195990010298368> At the start of your next turn: +1 Action and +1<:coin:377195990010298368>
lookout:
+1 Action
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one back on top of your deck.
smugglers: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6<:coin:377195990010298368> that the player to your right gained on their last turn.
caravan:
+1 Card
+1 Action

At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.
cutpurse:
+2<:coin:377195990010298368>

Each other player discards a Copper (or reveals a hand with no Copper).
island:
Put this and a card from your hand onto your Island mat.
---------------
2<:VP:377195966471864320>
navigator:
+2<:coin:377195990010298368>

Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard them all, or put them back in any order.
pirate-ship: Choose one: +1<:coin:377195990010298368> per Coin token on your Pirate Ship mat; or each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes one of those Treasures that you choose, and discards the rest, and then if anyone trashed a Treasure you add a Coin token to your Pirate Ship mat.
salvager:
+1 Buy

Trash a card from your hand. +1<:coin:377195990010298368> per 1<:coin:377195990010298368> it costs.
sea-hag: Each other player discards the top card of their deck, then gains a Curse onto their deck.
treasure-map: Trash this and a Treasure Map from your hand. If you trashed two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Golds onto your deck.
explorer: You may reveal a Province from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold to your hand. If you don't, gain a Silver to your hand.
ghost-ship:
+2 Cards

Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from their hand onto their deck until they have 3 cards in hand.
merchant-ship: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2<:coin:377195990010298368>.
outpost: If this is the first time you played an Outpost this turn, and the previous turn wasn't yours, then take an extra turn after this one, and you only draw 3 cards for your next hand.
tactician: If you have at least one card in hand, discard your hand, and at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Action, and +1 Buy.
treasury:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1<:coin:377195990010298368>

 When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this onto your deck.
wharf: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards and +1 Buy.
